attributes.action: Add the 8 stages homicide timeline to the current used Dom5 forms by police
attributes.additional_details:
2 women on average a week are killed in England and Wales by a current or ex partner, violence against women and girls is at an all time high.
Domestic abuse and violence effects 1 in 3 women  1 in 5 children and 1 in 6 men.

We must make changes to stamp this out.
attributes.background:
Officially add the 8 stages-homicide timeline to the current dom 5 form used by police at callouts for domestic abuse.
This gives an extra level of understanding and safeguarding for the police and caller/organisations involved.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for police forces.
